object.name: Location
object.description: This object represents a point on the map.
object.html_description: This object represents a point on the map.
object.rst_description: This object represents a point on the map.

annotations.description: The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500
annotations.html_description: Optional. The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500
annotations.name: horizontal_accuracy

annotations.description: Time relative to the message sending date, during which the location can be updated; in seconds. For active live locations only.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Time relative to the message sending date, during which the location can be updated; in seconds. For active live locations only.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Time relative to the message sending date, during which the location can be updated; in seconds. For active live locations only.
annotations.name: live_period

annotations.description: The direction in which user is moving, in degrees; 1-360. For active live locations only.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The direction in which user is moving, in degrees; 1-360. For active live locations only.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The direction in which user is moving, in degrees; 1-360. For active live locations only.
annotations.name: heading

annotations.description: The maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. For sent live locations only.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. For sent live locations only.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. For sent live locations only.
annotations.name: proximity_alert_radius
